TopicTitle: Kerbal Space Program MULTIPLAYER War Series

Articles.Content:
Hello Kerbals of Kerbin, This is an urgent report! There is a battle going on between two factions in space. The 71 faction is clashing with the WCS-701 Faction and it is chaos up there. We are trying to get as much on air as possible but sometimes our cameras are not able to see it. Heres some footage of this ongoing conflict.

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/AcHKwbPuV6w?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-07T01:37:33Z" title="04/07/2015 01:37  AM" data-short="9 yr">April 7, 2015</time> by FTWG4M3RS**

I'd watch it if there was no voice recorded. The voice in the video burns my ears. Lag is real, also. 

And finally, North Dakota doesn't exist. 

Nice ships though ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
Lol spelled Dakota wrong, Thx for pointing it out
Please remove your youtube URL from "Location"... It destroys the forum layout.
alright. Thx for telling me. Happy to get feedback
The First 2 Non cinematic episodes are up at [https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLsfzoeKb4ZKz0QUgqJfb4kqrj3iJ1lbO0](https://www.Youtube.com/FTWG4M3RS)
First Cinematic Episode coming out soon for the KSP Multiplayer War Series

Removed due to fear of backseat moderating ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-08T01:33:30Z" title="04/08/2015 01:33  AM" data-short="9 yr">April 8, 2015</time> by Joshwoo69**
  
FEAR!

If you're ever streaming actual multiplayer PvP I'll drop in and check it out - I'll also be able to discipline DMP for you when (not if) it does something wrong ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
Moving this over to Live from Mission Control, the place to share your KSP-themed videos.
